## CREATE\_ORGANIZATION\_MUTATION variable

The CREATE\_ORGANIZATION\_MUTATION used to create the new organization. The user created the organization will be marked as admin of the organization.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
CREATE_ORGANIZATION_MUTATION: import("graphql").DocumentNode
```

## Remarks

This mutation is declared in talawa-API. Documentation for this mutation can find [here](https://github.com/PalisadoesFoundation/talawa-api/blob/develop/lib/resolvers/organization_mutations/createOrganization.js)
